Detailed Description

template<class SetsType = int>
class FimiFile< SetsType >

Class used to read a transactionnal db in the FIMI format and save data in the FIMI format.

This class is implemented uidung the stream classes of the iostream library. Consequently, it is less efficient thant the correspondig C class. The template parameter SetsType is the type of items in the transactions.
